sales_strategy: Highlight reach via ChicagoDoes TikTok & Instagram channels to showcase client exposure and engagement value. Remember this covers expenses including strategy, transportation, ideation, shooting, editing, & posting and our ChicagoDoes channels on TikTok & Instagram have over 75,000 followers!
product_description: Boost your hospitality brand with short-form videos on TikTok and Instagram, produced and published through ChicagoDoes’ high-reach channels. We create engaging reels that showcase your offerings, share behind-the-scenes moments, and tell your story—while promoting specials, tapping trending challenges, and encouraging user-generated content. Ideal for restaurants, bars, hotels, attractions, theaters, museums, transport, and retail, these reels expand your reach, elevate your online presence, and drive bookings and visits.
